attributes.action: Stop Milwood building 320 houses at Ash Flats Stafford and destroying local wildlife
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the planning application by Milwood Homes at Ash Flats, Stafford ST17.
Stop 320 houses being built on agricultural land and destroying the habitats of many species including buzzards and newts.
Stop them destroying a rural footpath enjoyed by many walkers and expanding the town into rural land.
application 13/19524/OUT Stafford Borough Council. by 28 November 2013.
